data: Charged by my father with a very delicate mission, I repaired, towards the end of May, 1788, to the château of Ionis, situated a dozen leagues distant, in the lands lying between Angers and Saumur.
château of Ionis | lands lying between Angers and Saumur
Sand, George, 1804-1876; Zérèga, Katherine Berry di [Translator]
